duties_responsibilities.duty: Exceed sales, revenue, profitability, and client satisfaction targets as assigned.
Develop and maintain a business plan across your portfolio accounts with individual account plans that achieve the assigned targets.

Build and maintain a healthy, qualified pipeline of new opportunities that lead to sales and revenues by working/networking across municipal leaders and attending/participating in local meetings & events.
Nurture and develop new opportunities that are innovative and strategic to growing the organization.
Ensure high client satisfaction and mitigate revenue & client losses by engaging client leaders, leading issue resolution and providing performance reviews and reports.

Establish yourself and the organization as a trusted adviser on the industry and community development services thought leader bringing unique, value-added insights to your clients that help them meet their objectives.
Work closely with the operations teams and organization leaders to grow revenue in existing accounts, develop winning solutions, serve clients better and meet overall financial objectives.
Execute successful account management and sales strategies, techniques, and best practices to optimize growth, win-rates, profitability, and client satisfaction.
Create and present market and competitively differentiated solutions that the organization can profitably deliver and support by working closely with operations and all departments.

Prepare and respond to all target account requests for proposals, company information, and presentations on the company’s capabilities in a manner that distinguishes the organization from competition.
Provide feedback to management to improve the success of sales, solutions, pricing, and go-to-market.
Maintain sales and client databases and provide reporting and forecasting as required.
Perform other duties as assigned by management.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree or higher, preferably in business, operations, public admin, construction, economics
